citations.narrative:
The area around the food and bedding supply has excessive trash and clutter. Areas of trash and clutter can allow
vermin such as rats and mice to nest and hide and then contaminate food and bedding. Contaminated food and bedding
could make the guinea pigs sick. Protect the food and bedding supply by removing the trash and clutter and storing the
supplies in a manner that protects them from contamination.

Some areas of enclosures are in need of repair;
-Fourteen feeders on the middle/south row of enclosures and nine feeders on the north row had rusted, rough and sharp
edges in areas that guinea pigs contact the feeders.
-The 56 enclosures closest to the east door have an area of rust that is forming where the enclosure wall contacts the
bedding area.
Rough and sharp edges could hurt the guinea pigs and rusted surfaces are no longer smooth and are difficult to properly
clean and sanitize.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.25(c)  Repeat
   
Facilities, general. 
The area around the food and bedding supply has excessive trash and clutter.  Areas of trash and clutter can allow 
vermin such as rats and mice to nest and hide and then contaminate food and bedding.  Contaminated food and bedding 
could make the guinea pigs sick.  Protect the food and bedding supply by removing the trash and clutter and storing the 
supplies in a manner that protects them from contamination. 
3.28(a)(1)  Repeat
   
Primary enclosures. 
Some areas of enclosures are in need of repair; 
-Fourteen feeders on the middle/south row of enclosures and nine feeders on the north row had rusted, rough and sharp 
edges in areas that guinea pigs contact the feeders.     
-The 56 enclosures closest to the east door have an area of rust that is forming where the enclosure wall contacts the 
bedding area.   
Rough and sharp edges could hurt the guinea pigs and rusted surfaces are no longer smooth and are difficult to properly 
clean and sanitize. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.

n
